What to do To make the game work:
1. Download : NFS carbon PC-DVD Working at this wondow

2. Download CRACK & KEYGEN from ->http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3550027/Need_For_Speed__Carbon_KEYGEN_and_CRACK_only

3. You will have 2 files from NFS carbon downloaded on to your PC. 1:NFSCARBON.mdf 2:NFSCARBON.mds 

4. Now to open/extract the MDF file the largest one ( THE GAME ) you need to download magicISO program from --> http://www.magiciso.com/

5.Now after you install the ISO program. open the MDF file and extract it to the folder you want.(for more info about ISOmagic please PM or ask here )

6. after you extract the MDF file you go and extract the KEYGEN & Crack file by using WinAce ( i personaly use taht program) 

7. Now you Go to the folder where you Extracted you NFSc game and press SETUP. 
the setup will require KEYGEN and that you can find in the other folder where you finc CRACK & KEY
enter key and continiue the instalation ( REMEMBER TO INSTALL THE GAME IN NEW FOLDER ) 

8. After your done installing the game copy the CRACK and paste in it the folder where you installed the NFSc 

9. tHATS all [ I hope ths tutorial was usefull for some ] ENJOY THE GAME ;)
